Name: Leaves

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Team leaves
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"F?rias","WidgetType":"scheduler","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":32,"WidgetColumns":32,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select   v.UserId, 
		                                    v.[User] as [text], 
		                                    DateAdd(hh, 9, cast(v.[Date] as DateTime)) as startDate,
		                                    DateAdd(hh, 18, cast(v.[Date] as DateTime)) as endDate,
                                            v.leavetype as LeaveType
                                    from    Analytics.Leave(@CurrentUserId) v, SecuritySystemUser ssu, [UserVacation] uv, [Event] e
                                    where	v.UserId = ssu.Oid and
                                            uv.[Oid] = V.Oid and
											ssu.IsActive = 1 and
                                            e.Oid = uv.Oid and
                                            e.GCRecord is null
									 /*[DateFilter]*/ and v.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
order by v.[User]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{"startDate":"StartDate","endDate":"EndDate"},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Pending Approval
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Leaves to Approve","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":32,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":null},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"Select  u.[UserId] as [User],
        u.[User] as UserName,
        u.LeaveType as Type,
        U.[Date] as [day],
        usr.HasImage as HasImage
from    Analytics.DatamartLeave u, UserVacation uv, [User] usr
where   u.Oid = uv.Oid and
		uv.state = 1 and 
        uv.RequestedApproval = 1 and
        u.UserId = usr.Oid
		/*[DateFilter]*/ and u.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
        order by u.[Date]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]
